DEMO_041_MSG_010:
́Do you see that squishy little blue monster over there? 
I want you to test out your potential powers against it...
DEMO_041_MSG_020:
́If you are indeed a real Monster Master, surely you'll
beat the goo right out of it in a battle.
DEMO_041_MSG_030:
́To start a fight with a monster, all you need to do is run over and touch it! Attack it and try to scout it before you defeat it!
ā
DEMO_041_MSG_040:
́If everything goes as I think it will, that monster will be
thoroughly impressed and join your team shortly afterwards!
